agent

Class Belief

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Belief

  • public class Belief
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the Belief of the agent. The belief consists of the agent's current Place, the places that are in his line-of-sight, the opponents locations that are in line-of-sight, his teamates locations, known clients locations (which may or may not be true), the clients that are onboard and if his desire is complete.

        See Also:

      • removeRedundantClients

        public void removeRedundantClients()
        In this method the agent cross references his client location list with the visible places. If he finds that one of his visible places matches a clients location he believed was true and no client is there anymore he then procedes to remove that client location from his list since it is no longer valid. For example we have a client that is at [0,4] and when the agent is in line-of-sight of that place he sees that no client is there, then he will remove that client location ([0,4] from the _clientsLocations list.

      • setDesireComplete

        Parameters:
        desireComplete - sets the desire of the agent
